de.linearbits.subframe

Class Measures

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.linearbits.subframe.Measures

  • public class Measures
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides access to a number of methods for measuring execution times, memory consumption etc. Parts of the code are inspired by http://nadeausoftware.com/articles/2008/03/java_tip_how_get_cpu_and_user_time_benchmarking All reported times are in nanoseconds. All reported sizes are in bytes.
    Author:
    Fabian Prasser, Florian Kohlmayer

      Visibility filter for members
